title: Electric current - max current on q-vs-time graph

content.question: The graph shows the cumulative amount of charge as a function of time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> that has passed through the cross-sectional area of a wire since time zero. During which of the following time intervals is the current in the wire the greatest?

choices.label: <math alttext="0 seconds, is less than or equal to, t, which is less than or equal to 3 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>3</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math>

<math alttext="3 seconds, is less than or equal to, t, which is less than or equal to 4 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>4</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math>

<math alttext="4 seconds, is less than or equal to, t, which is less than or equal to 13 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>13</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math>

<math alttext="13 seconds, is less than or equal to, t, which is less than or equal to 15 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>13</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="0 seconds, is less than or equal to, t, which is less than or equal to 3 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>3</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
